page.title: 17HAUT DE LA GARENNE
page.content: Haut de la Garenne was originally a Boys' Home, but it is now a mixed Children's Home. I was in care at Haut de la Garenne for eleven months. It is a very big building with beautiful grounds. It is situated above Gorey Castle and has views of the castle and the beach. When I went there all of the building was being used, but when I left only a third of it was in use. It is a shame, because it is gradually being closed. It is such a lovely place, and I shall be sorru to see it close. Opposite Haut de la Garenne is Faldouet dolmen, which is an ancient stone monument where throughout the years witchcraft has taken place. Altogether Haut de la Garenne and its surroundings are some of my favourite parts of Jersey.
